Thank you very much for honouring me with this Laureus award. I promise this will only be the beginning of further projects for disadvantaged children. #laureus #bigshoe #ozilfoundation

Danke für diesen Laureus Sport for Good Stiftung Ehrenpreis. ich verspreche, dass es der Auftakt für weitere Projekte ist, die benachteiligten Kindern zugutekommen. 

Laureus odulu ile beni onurlandirdiginiz icin tesekkur ederim. Engelli cocuklar adina yapacagim projeler icin bunun bir baslangic olacagina soz veriyorum.

شكرا على هذه الجائزة القيمة من لوريس أوردز، و اوعدكم أن هذه مجرد البداية لمشروعاتى لخدمة الأطفال ذو الإحتياجات الخاصة

Now it's official: I get the Laureus prize for charity. This fills me with great pride, gratitude, and I see it as an inducement. Even before the World Cup we´ve talked about what could i do, that would be sustainable in Brazil. Friends made me aware of the good work of BigShoe at that time. This organization gives children a normal life by doing successful surgeries. Therefore we decided to help in my name eleven children with surgeries before the World Cup. My „Eleven" - the best team in the world. My team. After the World Cup I increased the number of surgeries to 23 - also because we had 23 players in the      DFB-Team. We´ve chosen children with cleft lip and deformities for the surgeries. Now I get this award from Laureus Sport for Good Stiftung on Wednesday for my total commitment this year - and I accept it as well in the name of the medicals and Bigshoe workers. And as well of other volunteers who are committed to help disadvantaged children all over the world. Let us keep up the good work to help these children. #LaureusSportforGood #Bigshoe

Jetzt ist es offiziell: ich erhalte den Laureus Ehrenpreis für Wohltätigkeit. Das erfüllt mich mit großem Stolz, Dankbarkeit und ich sehe es auch als Ansporn. 
Schon vor der WM haben wir darüber gesprochen: Was kann man machen, dass in Brasilien etwas Nachhaltiges bleibt. Freunde haben mich damals auf die gute Arbeit von Bigshoe aufmerksam gemacht. Eine Institution, die dafür sorgt, dass es kranken Kindern nach Operationen besser geht und ihnen den Zugang zu einem normalen Leben ermöglicht wird. So haben wir vor der WM entschieden, elf Kinder-Operationen zu übernehmen und meinen Namen einzubringen. Meine „Elf“ – die beste Elf der Welt. Meine Mannschaft. Nach der WM habe ich dann auf 23 aufgestockt – auch, weil wir 23 Spieler im DFB-Team waren. Operiert wurden Kinder, die an Lippen-Kiefer-Gaumenspalte und an Verkrüppelungen gelitten haben. 
Jetzt bekomme ich von der Laureus Sport for Good Stiftung am Mittwoch diesen Preis für mein Gesamtengagement in diesem Jahr – und ich nehme ihn auch stellvertretend für die Ärzte und Bigshoe entgegen. Und für alle anderen freiwilligen und ehrenamtlichen Helfer, die sich für benachteiligte Kinder in dieser Welt einsetzen. Lasst uns weiter daran arbeiten, diesen Kindern zu helfen.

Artik resmi: Sosyal yardim dalinda Laureus odulunu aldim. Bu benim icin cok ozel ve cok buyuk bir onur. Dunya Kupasi oncesinde Brezilya icin neler yapabiliriz uzerine cok konusmustuk. BigShoe organizasyonundan arkadaslarim beni haberdar etti. Bu organizasyon basarili ameliyatlar yaparak ihtiyaci olan cocuklara normal bir hayat yasamalarina imkan veriyor. Benim adima 11 cocuga Dunya Kupasi oncesi ameliyatlari konusunda yardim etme karari aldik. Benim "onbirim" dunyanin en iyi takimi! DK sonrasi cocuk sayisini 23e yukselttik cunku Alman Milli Takiminda 23oyuncuyduk. Laureus Odulunu Carsamba gunu alacagim. Bu odulu bize cok buyuk yardimlari olan saglik ekibi ve BigShoe calisanlari adina ve engelli tum cocuklara yardim icin calisan herkes adina aliyorum. Cocuklara yardim edelim.

dear fans, 

after the international break last weekend the Premier League continues and the current champions Manchester City await us in the domestic Emirates Stadium. last season I didn’t lose a home game with Arsenal in the #bpl – which I hope to continue. we can also go into the game with self-confidence thanks to the victory in the Community Shield before the start of the season.

after the injury of Olivier it was important that we were able to win again with the offensive quality of Danny. in a few weeks, we hope that Theo can help us with his speed once more. there is not much time to train as many of us had a long World Cup and most of my teammates were on the road again representing their national teams.
I was previously injured and in the upcoming weeks there will be many national and international games taking place. 

in the games to come, it is very important for us to find a good way to maintain our winning streak. in order to achieve this we must get the running and passing lines of new players as perfectly coherent as possible! I believe we have a great team spirit and together with our coach Wenger, we can achieve success.
COME ON YOU GUNNERS! 

Mesut Özil

dear fans,
I'm truly amazed! I loved your comments so much that I have decided to give away five more "Brazuca" footballs instead of just the one from our match against Algeria. the winners will be contacted shortly! in addition to the original prize winner Ali Matar, the five other winners are for the following reasons :

Ashabana Gyan: „ ... I sailed across the Atlantic Ocean for 40 days, Caught 2 30 hour busses, as well as 4 flights and lastly a 3 day boat through the Amazon to get to Brazil to the World Cup and all o fit to watch my Arsenal stars play in the greatest show on Earth … “

ManYing Leong: "… my best friend is a die-hard fan of germany ozil. He is now receiving chemotherapy for his terminal cancer. He has a dream of wachting germany in world cup in live ... I wish to give him the ball valuable priceless support!“

Daniel Hartmann: „... my son noah eden was born at the 26th of june 2014 during the game GERMANY vs USA and some day i want to give him that ball as a mermory the the thime when he was born“

Susann Idres: „... I am German and my husband is Algerian, which made this match very special for us to watch. We are luckily still married“

Minh Meo Map: „... I always want to play football but an accident broke my right leg, therefore I can’t play football anymore. I stayed up till 5am yelling for you guys in that match, though one but it burnt up my passion for football once again“

thank you for your participations!

I'm still happy about the fact that I was able to play last sunday for Arsenal. and we even won 3:0. I think that we are on the way up after a rather difficult time...
there are only two goals for the rest of the season: to be among the first four of the Premier League and to win my first title this year in the UK - the F.A. Cup! all we need is 4 x 90 minutes of full concentration and then it's all in our hands.

herewith I want to thank all who supported me during the last weeks - especially you! I constantly followed your comments on Facebook. I was really happy about all the get well soon wishes during these difficult moments. 
Your Mesut

dear friends,
today I visited a project of the Arsenal Foundation together with Per Mertesacker. i was really impressed. every monday, children who have been victims of violence are training here with Arsenal coaches. The Arsenal Foundation has several projects that really need our support.
 
merhaba arkadaslar,
bugun Per Mertesacker ile Arsenal vakfinin projelerinden birisini ziyaret ettik. gercekten cok etkilendim. her pazartesi siddete maruz kalan cocuklar burada Arsenal koclariyla antrenman yapiyorlar. Arsenal vakfinin bizlerin destegine ihtiyac duydugu cok onemli projeleri var.
 
liebe freunde,
ich war heute zusammen mit Per Mertesacker bei einem projekt der Arsenal stiftung. bin total beeindruckt. jeden montag trainieren hier 20 kinder, die opfer von gewalt wurden, mit Arsenal trainern. die Arsenal stiftung hat mehrere solcher projekte und verdient jegliche unterstützung.
 
hola amigos,
hoy visité junto a Per Mertesacker un proyecto de la fundación Arsenal. me quedé muy impresionado. cada lunes, niños que fueron victimas de violencia entrenan a futbol con entrenadores del Arsenal. la fundación Arsenal tiene varios proyectos de este estilo y necesita nuestro apoyo.

Ich wurde jetzt in Madrid „vermessen“ und bin gespannt darauf, wie ich als Wachsfigur aussehe.


Haziran 2013 den itibaren kendimi ziyaret edebilirim. Madame Tussaud nun Balmumu müzesinde dilkilmis olacagim. Aktif futbol oynayan tek alman futbolcu olarak orda olacak olmam cok gurur verici bir durum ve ayrica Fan larim tarafindan secilmem de beni gurulandirdi. Madrid de ölcülerim alindi ve bitecegi zamani merakla bekliyorum.


Starting in June 2013, I will be able to visit myself. Because then "I" will be at Madame Tussauds' wax museum in Berlin. I am proud that I will be the only active German soccer player standing at Madame Tussauds and I am especially proud that I therefore got chosen by the fans.


I just got "measured" in Madrid and I am curious about how I will look like as a wax figure.


A partir de junio de 2013 me podré visitar a mi mismo, ya que harán una figura de cera mía en el museo Madame tussaud de Berlín. Estoy orgulloso de ser el único jugador alemán actual que tendrá su figura allí, pero más contento me pone saber que me han escogido los fans. Ahora en Madrid me "medirán", y estoy intrigado de ver cómo voy a ser de cera.

Bugün Sami Khedira , Real in basketbol takimindan oyuncular ve ben hastane de kücük cocuklari ziyarette bulunduk. Cocuklar icin cok güzel hediye oldu onlari ziyaretimiz. Onlara burdan tekrar gecmis olsun dileklerimi iletiyorum ve hastaliklarindan en kisa zamanda kurtulmalari dilegiyle.
